comment.body:
Hey Koschei, Im curious, will you only post photos and make brief summaries on each instance, or is there a series of steps you will lay out specifically in what areas you are targeting during intravaneous use (assuming injections since you mentioned this).

Is there an article on anything specific that you would like for us to give a gander that made you transcend into this direction? The only experience i have in medical knowledge, if any, is just a M.S. in Health care (but for business and admin). So i will not know all the terminology, but i do enjoy reading articles and studies.
just checking in and thanks for the insight bearded!
